name: Crewmate Survival: Hide n Seek
description:
Crewmate Survival: Hide n Seek - become the last survivor of the funny yet thrilling game!

Two playing modes for the user to play: You can choose to become a traitor and kill all the crewmates or to be a worker and run away from the killer. But be quick, you don't have much time! Keep your on the clock, if you can not finish the mission on time, you have to start over.

************** FEATURES ******************:
- Easy to play: Control your character with one finger!
- Two playing modes: Runaway and Kill
- Endless levels and endless fun!
- Thrilling time-limited modes
- Countless traitors to kill
- Seek your preys, hide yourself

It's time to join the endless fun of the hide-and-seek game, but with a ditigal version. Crewmate Survival: Hide n Seek game is now available, try now!
